name: Evergreen
description:
Evergreen is a reliable long-term technology partner for businesses. Our wide expertise is based on hundreds of delivered projects, that are being grown and further developed after the launch by us.
Evergreen aims to the main goal - WOW-results for our client’s businesses. Due to this mission, we provide a list of services - start from a full software development cycle, neural networks solutions to support maintenance.
 
Our main principles in cooperation with clients are:
partner approach to projects
financial guarantees of terms and quality in the contract
we work with the first persons of a company, to solve complex issues in a short period of time
strict adherence to NDA and 100% transparency
We are doing all the best to make your product perfect.
